thread.title: Beyoncé & Blue Ivy Were Disney Princesses IRL At Beauty And The Beast Premiere!
thread.title_full: Beyoncé & Blue Ivy Were Disney Princesses IRL At The Beauty And The Beast Premiere! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Beyoncé & Blue Ivy Were Disney Princesses IRL At Beauty And The Beast Premiere!
text:
This is exactly what our Monday morning needed.
Beyoncé and Blue Ivy Carter hit up the Beauty And The Beast premiere last week — and it legit looked like something straight out of a fairytale!
In typical Queen Bey fashion, the 35-year-old took to her website with the absolute best pictures from the family's night out! Yas!
Related: Ed Sheeran Reveals When Taylor Swift's New Album Is Coming 
As you can see (above), the Formation singer and her five-year-old daughter donned complementing outfits — and they were clearly having the time of their lives as they struck a pose and made some silly faces. We LOVES seeing this playful side of Bey!
AND poppa Jay Z was there too: 

It just wouldn't be right if the expecting songstress didn't take the opportunity for a mini photo shoot:

We mean:

This emerald dress is evvverything!
We're having so much FOMO!
You can see more snaps from the fun evening in the gallery ( above )!
[ Image via Beyonce . ] 
Tags: beauty and the beast , beyonce , blue ivy carter , celeb kidz , cute kidz , cute! , cuteness! , family , film flickers , jay z , photos!
